section.class: elementor-element elementor-element-c723737 elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default elementor-section elementor-top-section

h2.span: Anuncio de Cierre de Escuelas: (13 de Marzo de 2020) 7:00 PM

p.span: El Distrito Escolar Unificado Golden Plains otorga la más alta prioridad a la salud y seguridad de los estudiantes y el personal. Como precaución bajo el estado de emergencia nacional COVID-19, estaremos cerrados del lunes 16 de marzo al lunes 13 de abril. Hasta donde sabemos, no hay casos activos de COVID-19 en nuestra área. Todavía proporcionaremos comidas para llevar para el desayuno y el almuerzo en cada sitio de 11 a. A medida que la situación evolucione, continuaremos brindando actualizaciones a través de Aeries y las redes social

Attention Families,
Golden Plains Unified School District places the highest priority on student and staff health and safety. As a precaution under the COVID-19 national state of emergency, we will be closed Monday, March 16th – Monday, April 13th. To our knowledge, there are no active cases of COVID-19 in our area. We will still provide grab and go meals for breakfast and lunch at each site from 11 AM – 1 PM, Monday through Friday. As the situation evolves, we will continue to provide updates via Aeries and social media.

h2.span: Esta página está dedicada a proporcionarle información y actualizaciones sobre el Coronavirus también conocido como Covid19
This page is dedicated to provide you with information and updates regarding the Coronavirus also known as Covid19

a.span: Correspondencia anexada escrita por el Superintendente 3.13.2020

span.a: ia anexada escrita por el Superintendente
Detenga la Propagacion de Los Microbios

div.p: The Golden Plains School District is committed to providing high quality education to all students. Our staff provides a caring and compassionate environment as well as rigorous and challenging curriculum. Communication between parents, community and school is imperative.

div.a: 22000 Nevada Street San Joaquin, CA 93660 United States
